title: Challenges in Housing and Mortgage Markets
content: - 14 -       their part as well.  In that spirit, I would like to close by expressing my appreciation and   admiration for the work that so many of you are doing to restore our neighborhoods and   to help individuals and families regain a solid financial footing.     Thank you.
